start.text: You wake up in a mysterious forest. The sun is setting and you hear strange noises in the distance. You see two paths ahead of you.

choices.text: Take the left path towards the glowing lights
Take the right path towards the sound of water

left_path.text: You follow the glowing lights and discover a friendly village of forest spirits. They offer you magical berries.

choices.text: Accept the berries and eat them

right_path.text: You follow the sound of water and find a beautiful waterfall with a hidden cave behind it. The cave entrance looks ancient.

choices.text: Stay by the waterfall and rest

magic_berries.text: The berries give you the ability to understand animal language! You befriend the forest creatures and become the guardian of the forest.

continue_exploring.text: You continue through the forest and eventually find your way back home, with amazing stories to tell about your adventure.

ancient_cave.text: Inside the cave, you discover ancient treasure and mysterious writings on the walls. This could be a great archaeological discovery!

choices.text: Study the writings and become an archaeologist
Take some treasure and return home wealthy

waterfall_rest.text: While resting, you notice a hidden message carved near the waterfall that leads you to a secret garden of eternal peace.

archaeologist.text: Your discovery makes you famous! You spend your life uncovering ancient mysteries and become a renowned archaeologist.

treasure.text: You return home with incredible wealth and live a comfortable life, always remembering your amazing adventure.
